entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Professor Lupin is introduced as a character who appears in the fireplace and has a conversation with Snape.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is introduced as a character who calls out for Professor Lupin and is described as having a contorted face with fury.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who was carrying the parchment and is described as being bewildered.

entities.name: moony
entities.description: Moony is mentioned as one of the names on the parchment.

entities.name: wormtail
entities.description: Wormtail is mentioned as one of the names on the parchment.

entities.name: padfoot
entities.description: Padfoot is mentioned as one of the names on the parchment.

entities.name: prongs
entities.description: Prongs is mentioned as one of the names on the parchment.

relationships.description: Snape calls out for Professor Lupin.
Snape accuses Harry of carrying the parchment.
Professor Lupin examines the map on the parchment.
